title: Giving Up
description: Jake White started as my bully.Jake White made me fall in love with him.And Jake White left.He broke my heart and he deserted Stoneview. He abandoned his twin and his friends, and he left me behind to confront it all by myself.And Nathan? Well…he stayed.Lovers’ betrayals, enemies’ redemptions, and families’ secrets. I’m a few months from graduation, the clock is ticking, and my life won’t stop spinning.Tick-Tock, it’s time to stop pretending to be a good girl.But above all?It’s time to make a choice.This book is approximately 135,000 words and is the last book of a three-book series. Giving Up is a dark high school bully romance intended for mature readers. If you are unsure of your triggers, please heed the author’s trigger warning in the book
author: Lola King
